content: fingerless lace gloves c 2017 / elena madsen designs basic info materials 1 sport weight yarn 12 wpi 2 approx 100 yards / 91 meters 3 5 mm crochet hook us h/8 size one size options for different size work a foundation single_crochet row in multiple of 6 to fit your wrist or change hook size notes - the pattern is worked in rounds - all rounds are worked from the right side - the beginning chain-3 of each round counts as a double_crochet - the yardage is approximate you can use more yarn for a longer glove - - you can watch the full videl tutorial here stitches used us terms and abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet double_crochet double_crochet v_stitch v-st = double_crochet chain 2 double_crochet in the same st shell = 5 double_crochet in the same v-st foundation single_crochet fsc stitches st previous prev space space st count the st count in noted in a after each row c 2017 / elena madsen designs pattern video first make fsc row of 18 or multiple of 6 join with a slip_stitch to form a ring be careful not to twist round 1 rs - chain 5 double_crochet in the same st skip 2 st *v-st in the next skip 2 st* around - join to beginning 3rd chain of the round 6 v-st round 2 rs - slip_stitch in the first v-st chain 3 2 double_crochet in the same v-st - chain 2 single_crochet in the next v-st chain 2 - *1 shell in the next v-st chain 2 1 single_crochet in the next v-st chain 2* around - after last repeat work 2 more double_crochet into the same v-st as beginning chain-3 - join with a slip_stitch to beginning 3rd chain of the round 3 shells 3 single_crochet s & 6 chain-2 space round 3 - chain 5 double_crochet in the same st v-st in the next single_crochet - *v-st in top of the next shell v-st in the next single_crochet* around - join to beginning 3rd chain of the round 6 v-st round 4 - slip_stitch in the first v-st chain 1 1 single_crochet in the same v-st - chain 2 1 shell in the next v-st chain 2 - *single_crochet in the next v-st chain 2 1 shell in the next v-st chain 2* around - join with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet of the round 3 shells 3 single_crochet s & 6 chain-2 space c 2017 / elena madsen designs pattern video round 5 - chain 5 double_crochet in the same st v-st in top of the next shell - *v-st in top of the next single_crochet v-st in the next shell* around - join to beginning 3rd chain of the round 6 v-st round 6-18 repeat round 2-5 making the hole for the middle finger you can just wear the glove as is or you can make a hole for your midd -
